mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sys_auth WHERE `parent_auth_id` NOT IN (SELECT id FROM (SELECT id FROM sys_auth) a) AND (parent_auth_id!=0 OR parent_auth_id!=NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT a.`id`, a.`parent_auth_id`, a.`parent_auth_ids`, a.`name`, a.`sort`, a.`href`, a.`icon`, a.`shows`, a.`create_user_id`, a.`create_time`, a.`update_user_id`, a.`update_time` FROM `sys_auth` a,`sys_role_auth` ra,`sys_role` r WHERE a.`id`=ra.`sys_auth_id` AND ra.`sys_role_id`=r.`id` AND r.`id`=#{id}
select id, parent_auth_id, parent_auth_ids, name, sort, href, icon, shows, create_user_id, create_time, update_user_id, update_time from sys_auth where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.`id`, a.`parent_auth_id`, a.`parent_auth_ids`, a.`name`, a.`sort`, a.`href`, a.`icon`, a.`shows`, a.`create_user_id`, a.`create_time`, a.`update_user_id`, a.`update_time` FROM `sys_auth` a,`sys_role_auth` ra,`sys_role` sr,`sys_user_role` us WHERE a.`id`=ra.`sys_auth_id` AND ra.`sys_role_id`=sr.`id` AND sr.`id`=us.`sys_role_id` AND us.`sys_user_id`=#{value} order by a.sort asc
